issue.title: [C++][Gandiva][MinGW] Enable crashed tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some Gandiva tests are crashed with MinGW. They are disabled in `ci/scripts/cpp_test.sh`.

We should fix the problems of the crashes and enable these tests.
